headline: Is It Time To Reassess L3Harris Technologies (LHX) After Its Strong 1-Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether L3Harris Technologies at around US$314 a share is offering good value right now, you are not alone. The stock sits in a part of the market where price and expectations are closely watched. The share price has returned 6.4% over the last 7 days, 12.9% over the last 30 days, 3.3% year to date, 57.9% over 1 year, 66.0% over 3 years and 88.2% over 5 years, which naturally raises questions about how the current price lines up with fundamentals.
